name: A. Circle Line
statement:
The circle line of the Berland subway has stations. We know the
distances between all pairs of neighboring stations: is the distance
between the -st and the -nd station; is the distance between the -nd and
the -rd station;... is the distance between the -th and the -th station;
is the distance between the -th and the -st station.The trains go along
the circle line in both directions. Find the shortest distance between
stations with numbers and .
